Title: Arconiss
Description:
If I am to fight Jahesh, leader of the yaungol mist-shaman, I must have Arconiss by my side. Arconiss' ferocity is second to none.

He rests beneath the mists of the Upper Sumprushes. Find his resting place, and then use these torches to awaken him.
ObjectivesText: Summon Arconiss by planting the Mist-Shaman's Torches into the Peat Mound in the Upper Sumprushes.
CompletionText: Arconiss' size belies his prowess in battle. He will be an asset.
RewardText: It will be difficult to lose with Arconiss by my side.
